snippet: Elizabeth Warren says that Paul D. Ryan's budget proposals are so harsh that they will spook voters in Massachusetts into realizing that keeping Senator Scott P. Brown in office would only provide a rubber stamp for a draconian Romney-Ryan...
abstract: Elizabeth Warren says that Paul D. Ryan's budget proposals are so harsh that they will spook voters in Massachusetts into realizing that keeping Senator Scott P. Brown in office would only provide a rubber stamp for a draconian Romney-Ryan administration.

headline.main: In Massachusetts, Warren Seeks to Link Brown to Romney-Ryan
